duties_responsibilities.duty: Connect and follow up with real estate investors to progress the pipeline.
Make regular phone calls to existing and prospective real estate investors, promoting property deals, and ensuring active engagement.
Leverage SMS and email for efficient follow-ups and to maintain strong investor relationships.
Manage multiple follow-ups and facilitate deal closings using negotiation skills.
Engage with investors, understand their property interests, and advocate suitable properties.
Collect investment criteria of buyers once on the phone with them.
